title: Edu Buddies
author: Nizam Uddin
details: Its a website project for students who want to learn new technology online. They can select from multiple courses and buy their desired course.It has a different dashboard for students, instructor and admin. In the admin dashboard admin can control the whole site. In the instructor dashboard, instructors can manage course videos. And students can manage their full info etc

title: ShoeLace
author: Nizam Uddin
details: A Single page web app with dashboard. Like ecommerce site. Two types of user. The normal user will be able to add new products, give reviews and manage all his products in the dashboard. Admin will be able to manage all users and products.
